description: GirlScript Summer of Code is the three-month-long Open Source program during summers conducted by GirlScript Foundation, started in 2018, to help beginners get started with Open Source Development while encouraging diversity. Throughout the program, participants contribute to different projects under the guidance of experienced mentors.
tasks: Contributed to several projects built with Python and JavaScript.
Collaborated with like-minded students from across India on team projects.
Discussed breakthrough ideas with several open-source pioneers of the country.
